website_summaries.verdict: Big battery capacity in a nice handheld design that makes it easy to light almost anything.
pros: Huge battery capacity in a USB lighter that can deliver up to 1,000 uses on a charge
Includes a child-resistant switch to prevent accidental ignitions
With the wand-style design in this USB lighter, it's easy to use
cons: Some problems with quality control, as the USB lighter occasionally stops holding a charge after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: This worked well as a lighter for a few weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked well as a lighter for a few weeks before it suddenly seemed to stop working. I assumed that it had simply lost it's charge so I tried to recharge it and so I could use it again, once it showed that it was fully charged I unplugged it and tried to use it to light a candle, it didn't work and instead I noticed that the handle had become warm and soon smoke started to come out of the charging port. And some of the plastic had melted a bit. I threw it away once it had cooled down.
customer_reviews.author: Hitomi

customer_reviews.title: No more flame lighters - ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of buying lighters that wouldn't work when I needed them. Not to mention, when I use this one in front of people, they usually as amazed that it is not an actual flame. Do not need to be charged consistently. I had it for several months and it is still working on the first charge.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great lighter; check carefully for charger cord
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed! Works great. Safe design. I shared a photo (with silver marker) to show where the charger cord is hidden, since so many people said they didn’t get it. You have to look inside that little strip of cardboard
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Utensil
customer_reviews.text: Clean, durable, nice looking unit. I use it everyday to light a candle. It lit so many times I finally charged it because I assumed it was running low, but I don't know. Charges quickly. No problems. Clean. Much safer than flame. Wipe it off occasionally, it seems like it will last forever! Conversation starter, too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Works very good on candles
customer_reviews.text: Works very good on candles, not so good to light the gas grill. Easy to use and the long neck is very useful
customer_reviews.author: Jerry G

customer_reviews.title: Great item, especailly if you have lots of candles to light!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an awesome item. No more lighting matches when I light all my candles. It comes with a USB recharger (which I have yet to have to use)
customer_reviews.author: Songbird

customer_reviews.title: This is such a cool lighter, we use it for candles
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cool lighter, we use it for candles, and it's much better than reaching down in the jar to light the wick with a match. It stays charged for a long time, and it just looks cool with the electric arc that is the lighter part. Also, unlike with fuel lighters, the tip isn't hot after using it, so you don't have to worry about it burning or melting anything when you put it down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy - Serious Hazard of Electric Shock!!
customer_reviews.text: The lighter stopped working after a few (about 20 times) usage for lightening candles. After breaking, there is huge electric shock on the lighter. It is not fatal (because of low current) but could be potentially dangerous. I am not sure why these defective items without passing safety tests are allowed to be sold in Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Dadgar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Lights my camp stove top with ease! I like how it's "sustainable" via recharging battery.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I like how you can retract the top part for safety. These lighters are so great as they dont require any fuel, just a USB recharge every so often. I use them for candles and incense all the time. It shows clearly how much charge you have left each time you use it and it takes no time at all to recharge. I will be getting more of these for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Arc lighter for candles, etc..
customer_reviews.text: I only used the lighter a few times but it worked well for lighting candles.
customer_reviews.author: E. Delligatti

customer_reviews.title: This was a great replacement for matches
customer_reviews.text: This was a great replacement for matches. I have no complaints at this time. I only charged it once and it has been working for five months without another charge.
customer_reviews.author: J Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I would rate this 4 1/2 stars. It charges quickly. Is actually fun to use (for some reason I am fascinated by the arc). It works great in the wind although, if it's too windy, it lights a candle but the wind blows out the flame (not the product's fault. Blame the wind). I minus a half star because if you're trying to light a candle and the wick is embedded in the cold wax this will not work. Since there is no flame to melt the wax surrounding the wick it cannot light it. I needed to use an old fashioned flame stick. While this isn't a design flaw, it's an annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Kat K

customer_reviews.title: How much more fun can you have
customer_reviews.text: Coolest thing on the face of the earth. Starts fires... can chase employees around because they think it is a taser. How much more fun can you have??
customer_reviews.author: SFT

customer_reviews.title: The arc gap is too narrow compared to other models- The state of charge feature is nice
customer_reviews.text: The arc gap is too narrow compared to other arc candle lighting models The state of charge feature is nice When lighting candles one gets to pay close attention to keep the electrodes on the wick and out of the wax
customer_reviews.author: Jamey W.

customer_reviews.title: How good can your $ be worth if the product doesn't last more than 3 month
customer_reviews.text: Brought it back in March. After 2 month of regular use (2~3 times a day), it decided to stop working. While the unit still charges with LED indicator on, however, it just won't light up like it suppose to. Buy it at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ying

customer_reviews.title: Candle lighter USB!
customer_reviews.text: Candle lighter USB! We love to lit candles at our home several times a week and the lighters we had been using would stop working very quickly, we had to put gas in them or buy matches, when I found out about these arc USB lighter I knew I had to have them, they make my life easier and so simple! I just charge it USB when necessary!
customer_reviews.author: MediaBoxEnt

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a ton of household liquid lighters
customer_reviews.text: I’m really impressed with this lighter. It came fully charged right out the box, slid up the safety lock, pressed the button and was able to light a candle within a few seconds. Glad I won’t need to purchase lighters that use liquid fuel any longer. This electric replacement should save quite a bit. The family is heavy candle users so this will get a lot of use now. I like the safety lock so the little ones won’t be able to get a hold of it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Used this last winter for my fireplace and worked very well. Using the thin paper (newspaper or paper towel) as fire starter was the best method for me. It lasted 3 weeks with one full charge, starting the fire in the morning and evening. Better keep this lighter from kids, it can be dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Yspecial

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BYE FUEL LIGHTERS!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I do not have to buy refills for my candle lighters anymore! It is the neatest thing I’ve ever bought of amazon (it’s the little things right?). Im so happy I don’t have to risk a burn to light my candles. I think its so great that all you have to do is recharge it if it runs out of battery. It also has a button protector so it is fool proof of “accidently” lighting anything. This is such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Errrrrka

customer_reviews.title: USB part broke
customer_reviews.text: I liked this a lot it's way easier than a regular lighter and I hoped it would last for a long time. Unfortunately, the metal piece that you connect the USB charger to became loose when I disconnected it after charging and fell inside of the plastic body, so I can no longer charge it. I was disappointed and felt bad about adding more plastic to the trash. Also if I held it on for too long, the plastic around the plasma beam melted. Next time I'm going to look for a more sturdily built version if I can find one.
customer_reviews.author: Noora

customer_reviews.title: Goooooood
customer_reviews.text: It is great and I'm in love! The material is amazing and the color is absolutely gorgeous. I was very hesitant buying authentically through Amazon, I chose to buy through Amazon and fulfilled by Amazon as I believe this would be the safest option, and I don't regret a thing. It looks perfect, and it got here in only two days! Happy shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working 3 1/2 months in
customer_reviews.text: I loved it while it worked, but I'm very disappointed that it didn't last. I went to charge it, and it didn't charge at all. I'm not sure how to contact the seller, so here you go.
customer_reviews.author: Westcoastgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great lighter!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this flameless lighter so much that we bought several more to give as gifts. Lighting a candle can take a few seconds, but is much easier than with a butane lighter or similar. No burned fingers too! The charge lasts a long time, longer than I expected – I charged it after a month and it was still almost fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: MARTIN HELLMAN

customer_reviews.title: What A Great Concept and Execution
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to light our backpacking stoves rather than carry matches. Charged it up and used it for 3 days in Grand Canyon, lighting the stove multiple times a day/night, and it functioned perfectly. We were all very impressed, and the matches I took as backup never had to come out. Such a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: ClayEE

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Clean, durable, nice looking unit. I use it every day to light candles. It lit so many times I finally charged it because I assumed it was running low. Charges quickly. No problems. Clean. Much safer than flame. Wipe it off occasionally, it seems like it will last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Ackerly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This electronic lighter works as advertised. Really easy to use too. Comes with a USB charger. I need a tiny version of this for my purse
customer_reviews.author: Geetha

customer_reviews.title: Charge lasts long and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My first arc lighter, easy to use, lasts as long as you use it. Some folks said you have to charge it often but I’ve had it for more than a month, light up once a day and have not charged it since it arrived. The different color options are really cool. Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: chaovaca

customer_reviews.title: Breaks down over time; annoys cat
customer_reviews.text: The electrodes are spring loaded and have to spread as you open it. This spring has worn out after a few months and it’s difficult to light a wick at this point. Look for one with fixed “electrodes.” Also annoys the crap out of the cat. Must make a weird noise.
customer_reviews.author: HelperMunkee

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few short uses
customer_reviews.text: This was a very cool product. I used it for candles around the house. I seldom light candles so this thing has only been used maybe 10 times in the 8 months I've had it. Roughly once a month I decide to light some candles. This lighter just stopped working all together. I understand that it's 8 months old but considering how infrequently I used it, I'm shocked.
customer_reviews.author: bbass

customer_reviews.title: One of the best tool I own
customer_reviews.text: So long frustrating lighters that only work when you test them! I use it on my propane stoves and it works every time and the battery last a long time between charges. My wife uses hers for candles and we have not had to clean ether one since we have had them for over a year. We purchased several of them for Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: gps lover

customer_reviews.title: Money up in flames
customer_reviews.text: It's a piece of junk. Works two or three times and then has to be re charged. Have a lot of candles in the house and wanted something like this ...It's back to old fashioned matches.
customer_reviews.author: shay's #3 fan

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly and effectively
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used a candle lighter before. This works so well I can’t believe I didn’t know this existed. I had a huge 3 wick candle and using the lighter was next to impossible. This is so convenient, quick, efficient. Definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Summu

customer_reviews.title: so fun and so smart
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long to buy this!? So easy to use. I won't have to worry about having an empty lighter or disposing of one. I love to light candles and this is great. My kids think it is pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Rahbin1

customer_reviews.title: Super cool and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: So cool!! It is great for candles (what I use it for). Mostly it’s just super cool though! It’s gonna be nice to always have a lighter that won’t run out of lighter fluid! It is a bit large so not ideal for carrying around
customer_reviews.author: Landon Ostler

customer_reviews.title: Isn't worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product primarily for lighting candles. Used it once and then the second time I attempted to use it, it wouldn't work. Recharged it again and still nothing. Piece of junk. Do not have the original box so cannot return it. I wouldn't suggest anyone buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Gray

customer_reviews.title: So worth purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: I was getting weary of purchasing matches to light birthday candles for the family and I am so happy I purchased this lighter. It has a nice safety feature, easy to use and lights very fast and efficiently. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy maintenance and saves space
customer_reviews.text: No more lightning the candles with a matchstick with all the hassle of having to go with few more sticks when needed and then safely trashing them, Phew!!! Easy to charge and the battery is still full after three weeks of use. The button is hidden so that we may not light it by mistake. A little shorter in length would have been nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Kin H

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use & does the trick for my tall candles. It has some weight to it which is nice; feels like good quality. I do wish the prongs were slightly further apart but it still does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Coy

customer_reviews.title: But this now!
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long to buy this?! So easy, convenient, durable! I go through candles like whoa, so I use lighters all the time. I don’t have to worry about buying lighter fluid ever again! Just a heads up for pet owners, it makes a sound that seems to terrify my two cats
customer_reviews.author: Didi88

customer_reviews.title: Besides the "cool" factor, it's a great gadget
customer_reviews.text: We took a gamble and bought six of these to give away at Christmas. Everyone, including us, have loved them. I don't know how it could light a BBQ as it would seem too short. We've used it many times and are glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is great and I'm in love! The material is amazing and the color is absolutely gorgeous. I was very hesitant buying authentically through Amazon, I chose to buy through Amazon and fulfilled by Amazon as I believe this would be the safest option, and I don't regret a thing. It looks perfect, and it got here in only two days! Happy shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: YES. YES. YES. if you are a candle lover like I am, you need this! I absolutely love how I don’t have to dig around in drawers for a candle lighter. It does get dirty with soot pretty fast but I just wipe it down with a tissue every few uses and it’s good as new
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic alternative lighter
customer_reviews.text: This works great as an alternative to a conventional gas lighter! It's perfect for starting campfires or lighting a gas grill / stove. Being rechargeable, it will surely last you for a long time if you don't break it! Solid buy, personally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Danté S.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that this is rechargeable, the sound it makes is similar to nails on a chalkboard but it doesn't last that long. The charge keeps up great, even when lighting at least two candles every day.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Really great!!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is so cool and I love that it's rechargable!Really great!! Ive used this a few times and it’s incredible. The fact that I can recharge this and not have to keep buying gas ones is much more eco friendly.Definitely saving money. Buy this!I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya barnes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the packaging really nice product........no more running out of gas and having to look about for refill gas
customer_reviews.author: RevWest

customer_reviews.title: Initial product was defective!  Replacement works as it should.
customer_reviews.text: 4/2/2020 - Product was defective on arrival - after charging the battery three times the product still would not work. Returning product for a replacement. I will add to this review when I receive the replacement. 4/10/2020 - Received the replacement product within a couple of days. This time the product worked like it is supposed to. Changing my rating to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Getz

customer_reviews.title: Best lighter!
customer_reviews.text: I hate lighters until I bought this one!! Easy to use, lights every time, and rechargeable. I’ve even told several family members about it and they’ve bought it and loved it!
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Charge fully, long battery life!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, always works easily and effortlessly. Once I fully charge the product the battery life made me forget that I needed to recharge it! I don’t burn the glass on my candles anymore and it easier to control than a flame. Are use it on incense sticks as well and provides a way easier and cleaner light. Overall very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: LXcampo

customer_reviews.title: Cool lighter
customer_reviews.text: I wanted one without a flame for when I smoke. To not inhale the chemicals etc. This works well and the charge lasts long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: NO TORCH NEEDED FOR CANDLES & MORE
customer_reviews.text: USB CHARGING - WORKS EVERY TIME - NEVER RUNS OUT AND I PURCHASED A 2ND ONE AND I WILL BE BUYING MORE FOR UPSTAIRS - THANK YOU FOR A FANTASTIC PRODUCT !
customer_reviews.author: Aries1

customer_reviews.title: great lighter
customer_reviews.text: i left the other lighter that we had by the bbq in it died. i ordered this one so my wife wouldnt get upset with me. she is really happy with the product and i didnt have to go to the dog house. great product.
customer_reviews.author: oscar man

customer_reviews.title: Quit working, period, after a half-dozen uses and won’t charge.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great purchase when it arrived, easy to use, and the perfect length for lighting candles without an actual flame, however I used it less than a half dozen times and it quit working. I charged it overnight, it barely got one candle lit and quit again. Charging it didn’t help. It’s completely done in.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny K.

customer_reviews.title: Cool Lighter
customer_reviews.text: I love this lighter! I don't have to charge it a lot because the battery lasts as while. I also like how you have to slide it all the way up to the lock for it to turn on and slide it all the way down to turn it off. Seems pretty safe and it can save me a lot of money. Now I don't need to buy matches or lighters.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Works, is rechargeable and has a "cool" factor.
customer_reviews.text: The lighter is quite powerful and lights candles easily. It does require more aiming accuracy than does a flame. You need to get the wick positioned between the prongs to be within the plasma arc. With a flame, you don't need to be as precise. This does have a cool factor,
customer_reviews.author: Picky picky picky

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: We use a lot of candles in our house so we require having a lighter often. This little electric lighter is incredibly useful simply because you can charge it. It also makes a cool sound when you use it that makes it sounds like a laser beam. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cthorp7

customer_reviews.title: Fine product, terrible sound
customer_reviews.text: The product works well. I use it to light candles and it’s great for that. However, the sound this thing makes is unholy. A super high pitched ring. In the seconds it takes to light a candle I get a headache. Would not recommend if you’re sensitive to sound at all.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Coovert

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this for lighting her candles. Works really well and seems to hold a charge for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Deane

customer_reviews.title: Fun Lighter
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I could light candles for my Masonic Lodge and its super cool the guys love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt J. Zimmerle

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and functional. Reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, no more worry about fuel. Use it mainly for fireplaces but also does B'day candles well
customer_reviews.author: Ernest N.

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic lighter
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic lighter. It's easy to charge, has a long battery life, and is easy to use. It also has a little hook on the end of it so you can hang the lighter somewhere instead of just having it sitting on your counter where your kids can get to. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Mehdikhan

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lighter ! So nice that you just recharge it and no refilling required. Going to buy more ! So Happy with this purchase:)
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Very cool invention. We light Shabbos candles and I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cool invention. We light Shabbos candles and I have a couch under the shelf where we light so it always made me nervous, with this, I don't worry and the candle get lit. Then I just charge it in the computer!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn K.

customer_reviews.title: Rechargeable
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas present. My husband love new gadgets. It works well
customer_reviews.author: Deb D

customer_reviews.title: Fire 🔥 stick
customer_reviews.text: Could be a good started for a gas grill, if we are allowed to go outside!
customer_reviews.author: James M. Salake

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Love this for candles especially, essential to home and don’t need to buy lighters anymore. Perfect for traveling. And for college dorms, for candles or cooking as well. I definitely recommend everyone have one.
customer_reviews.author: Zelaikha Naderi

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: At first it seemed like a great alternative for a lighter. But the battery life is horrible, and the charger cable they give you is very short. Also some people can’t stand the high pitch noise it makes.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for lighting cigarettes. Also works as a mini taser. Trust me on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Great ignitor
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and good design. It lighted my stoves instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Lighter I have bought. The first one fell apart and was not usable. This second one I just took out of the box for the first time and doesn't work and I can't even move the button to expose the prongs. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ann Clemenson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 45 days of use
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this lighter earlier in the year and followed all instructions as provided. It ran out of full charge after the first 30 days or so, and the second charge in less than 15 days (of regular 7-8 times per day use). The charge after that lasted for less than 2 days and now the lighter is dead. There is no link in purchase history to send feedback directly to the seller so sharing our experience here.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Lighter
customer_reviews.text: Liked it so well that. I purchased 3 more for gifts
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Def buy again! Great item!!
customer_reviews.text: ONE OF THE BEST ITEMS EVER PURCHASED! Bought for all the guys for Christmas and none of them have seen them and thought they were awesome! Works fantastic! Great gift idea!!
customer_reviews.author: MarcyJ

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery in a cool box, charges quickly. Little hard to use
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Ryan

customer_reviews.title: NOT ALL PARTS WERE IN THE PACKAGE
customer_reviews.text: 【What Will You Get】1x SUPRUS arc lighter, 1x USB charging cable, 1x User Manual, 1USB CHARGING CABLE WAS MISSING
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Brunner

customer_reviews.title: Good Lighter
customer_reviews.text: Very cool lighter for candles. It's like a mini tazer.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great all three times that it worked.
customer_reviews.text: I used it three times, then it sat in a drawer for a couple of months. Now it won't work and won't take a charge, and the seller won't respond to email. So. not so great.
customer_reviews.author: TT WPB FL

customer_reviews.title: you do not need buy long sticker match anymore
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to operate, when you move the mode gear up, the switch will show up, you press it, the electric spark made bwn anodes . USB charging make you save the propane power. the indicator shows the energy left over.
customer_reviews.author: Silverado

customer_reviews.title: No longer works after few uses.
customer_reviews.text: Lighter dies and stopped working after 2 recharges. Does not retain lighter abilities for very long after charging. Does not work after very little use. Used to light a candle less than 12 times. I wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Reebs

customer_reviews.title: A high-level feeling
customer_reviews.text: Very advanced feeling, high grade, good practical inflatability, worth recommending, good style, good quality lighter, good feel
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ward

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lighting candles!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed! Perfect for lighting candles, which is what I will be using it for!
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great! Bought it for my husband for when we camp. Always an issue when lighting the grill or campfire when it's a little windy. Not with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Makes things catch on fire
customer_reviews.text: It's fun to use. I use it to light fires
customer_reviews.author: uncle chopper

customer_reviews.title: Do your research!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in Aug. 2019 and its Jan.2020 and this item has stopped working. NO SPARK!!. I don't know if I got a lemon or if this is how long to expect this to work either way I'm looking for a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Evans

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not for cigarettes
customer_reviews.text: Good for lighting candle, or propane oven, grill. Not the best for a cigarette or to carry as survival in a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: kapu

customer_reviews.title: The lighter you never knew you needed
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lighter for candles! It makes lighting tall jar candles so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Hmherron

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's been a week since I received this product. So far it's working fine with accuracy. The only issue I am having is whenever I light the candle it's getting black at the end of the lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Deepchand Pinnaka

customer_reviews.title: Never have to add fuel to make it work
customer_reviews.text: Everyone that I bought this for at Christmas time loved it because it was so unique in fact my daughter showed he Step daughter and she had to have one so immediately she got on line and ordered on for herself and her brother
customer_reviews.author: Janet Slayton

customer_reviews.title: I like this product very much
customer_reviews.text: The goods have been received the goods are genuine the effect is very good the logistics speed is very fast the merchants are also very awesome warm and careful I am very satisfied with a happy shopping
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I’ve had two for over a year and they perform just as well as the day I got them. I honesty use it for snipping loose threads on clothes and such more than lighting candles lol very long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Candles
customer_reviews.text: This works great but best to not use with candles, if candle wax gets on the tip it stops working after you clean of the wax. The arc is not strong enough to reach the opposite point, instead it arcs back on itself. This happened after about 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Anders Ek

customer_reviews.title: Great use
customer_reviews.text: This is great because you can keep recharging it and everyone is so fascinated by it. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: jade

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working less than 2 months later
customer_reviews.text: I received this product for Christmas and loved it but less than 2 months later I went to charge it and it won't charge at all. The USB cord is working because I tested it with another item. I wouldn't recommend buying this product; it doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this lighter. It just seems safer then an ordinary flame lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Mae Hinch

customer_reviews.title: These are very cool! I ordered a bunch and gave them as ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very cool! I ordered a bunch and gave them as Christmas gift to coworkers and family members along with a candle. It was a unique gift and everyone had a lot of fun trying them out!
customer_reviews.author: jenjen

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous lighter
customer_reviews.text: Love this lighter! Seems to last forever between charges. It’s fun to use, too.
customer_reviews.author: rr

customer_reviews.title: No more matches!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well! Separate power switch is a great idea. No more matches!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Schaap

customer_reviews.title: Not working out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Did not work out of the box. Received full refund through my Prime membership, so one starz
customer_reviews.author: Kristen O'donnell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lighter
customer_reviews.text: Love this lighter. I bought it 2 months ago,It makes lighting cigarette super easy compared to butane lighters.because I got really tired of having to click click click a butane lighter in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Duran11

product_meta.title: SUPRUS USB Lighter Arc Candle Lighter Coil Lighter Rechargeable Flameless Double Safety Windproof Aluminum Shell Perfect for Candle Gas Stove Camping BBQ Party Gift Box
feature_bullets: 【SAFETY DESIGN】- A safety lock switch is designed to preventing mistakenly touching. Over charging and over loading design protection, 7S auto shut off ensures to prevent high temperature damage.

【CONVENIENT 】- Wind & Splash Proof Design prevents the electric pulse produced from being blown out by strong wind, The lightweight design makes the lighter easy to carry and ideal for camping, BBQ ,hiking ,indoor and outdoor activitiess.

【BUTANE FREE】- No more harmful butane. SUPRUS uses plasma tech to eliminate the need for this harmful chemical.During the ignition, there will be noise of “ zee,zee”, which is high-voltage power generation, please use with relax.

【BATTERY NOTIFICATION】- This is the upgraded SUPRUS arc lighter which can display real time battery volume. When 4 LED lights on the barrel turn on, it is full charged.If you don't use the product very often, please recharge the Battery about 1 hours continuously for every 3 months to protect the life of the Battery.

【What Will You Get】1x SUPRUS arc lighter, 1x USB charging cable, 1x User Manual, 1x warranty card, 1 year warranty.It is delivered from amazon, violent vibration may damage internal components of lighter. When you have any issue with your lighter, please do not hesitate to contact us ( service@suprus-beauty.com )
